articles.description: Pakistan host England in the third Test at Rawalpindi Cricket Stadium – follow text & score updates plus radio commentary.
articles.title: Pakistan vs England LIVE: third Test, day one, Rawalpindi Cricket Stadium – cricket score, radio commentary and text updates

articles.description: Watch every Champions League goal after matches involving Liverpool, Manchester City and Celtic.
articles.title: Watch every Champions League goal, plus reaction as Liverpool and Man City win

articles.description: Erling Haaland's "amazing" acrobatic backheel volley for Manchester City against Sparta Prague on Wednesday left many of those who saw it live "speechless".
articles.title: Erling Haaland goal: Man City forward hailed after acrobatic goal in Champions League win over Sparta Prague

articles.description: Liverpool boss Arne Slot says records are nice but he would rather have trophies after his side's 11th win in 12 games.
articles.title: RB Leipzig 0-1 Liverpool: Will Arne Slot's Reds turn records into trophies after latest Champions League win?

articles.description: Barcelona humiliated Bayern Munich in their 4-1 Champions League win on Wednesday night, in large part thanks to three "exceptional" young midfielders.
articles.title: Barcelona: Champions League win built off youngsters Pedri, Fermin Lopez and Marc Casado

articles.description: As Jose Mourinho gets ready to face his old club Manchester United in the Europa League, Simon Stone looks back at his time in charge at Old Trafford.
articles.title: Manchester United: Inside Jose Mourinho's two-year reign at Old Trafford

articles.description: The widows of ex-footballers diagnosed with CTE tell BBC Sport about the pain of seeing their husbands suffer from the brain disease.
articles.title: Heading in football: Widows of ex-players with CTE tell their heartbreaking stories

articles.description: Kevin Durant scores 25 points and Bradley Beal 24 as the Phoenix Suns open their NBA season with victory over the Los Angeles Clippers.
articles.title: NBA: LA Clippers 113-116 Phoenix Suns - Kevin Durant & Bradley Beal shine for Suns

articles.description: Xander Schauffele calls himself "an idiot" after he cards a quadruple-bogey eight during the opening round of the PGA Tour's Zozo Championship in Japan.
articles.title: Xander Schauffele calls himself 'an idiot' after quadruple bogey farce in Japan

articles.description: Katie Boulter reaches her fifth WTA Tour quarter-final of the season by sweeping aside Japan's Kyoka Okamura in Tokyo.
articles.title: Katie Boutler reaches Toray Pan Pacific Open quarter-finals in Tokyo
